Indinesia: Mrs Suharto dedicates the vast 'Beautiful Indonesia-in-Miniature Park' (Taman Mini) on the outskirts of Jakarta.
Civil war breaks out in the former Portuguese colony of East Timor.
U.S. President Gerald Ford and Secretary of State Kissinger, returning from China, make a hastily rescheduled one-day visit to Jakarta.
Indonesia launches an invasion of East Timor.
